title: New: Melody's Echo Chamber – Crystallized
body:
Paris based **[Melody’s Echo Chamber](https://www.facebook.com/MelodysEchoChamber)**’s debut tune, _**Crystallized**_, is just what I need right now. I’ve just written an article about ‘tumblr swag wave rap’ for crying out loud. I think I need a cold shower. The track really is a treat. Part psychedelic dream fest, part fuzz fuelled dream fest; the track has a range of styles and motivations that are more than a bit exciting.

_**Crystallized**_ is due out on Fat Possum.
